Legal Hold retains files for legal purposes. A legal hold is comprised of the following elements:

* Preservation policy: Defines which kinds of files can be included in holds and how long to keep files.

* Matter: Defines individual holds.

* Custodians: The users whose files are placed under hold.

For more information about Legal Hold, see our [support article](https://support.code42.com/hc/en-us/articles/14827690803735).
